mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MAIL_BOX SET STATUS = 'EMSTS005', SKEY = #{SKEY} WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS IN ('EMSTS001', 'EMSTS002') LIMIT 10
UPDATE TBL_MAIL_BOX SET STATUS = 'EMSTS002' WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS IN ('EMSTS010')
mapper.select: SELECT A.MAIL_BOX_SEQ, A.TITLE, A.CONTEXT, A.SEND_NAME, A.SEND_EMAIL, A.RECV_EMAIL, A.CC_EMAIL, A.HCC_EMAIL, A.GFILE_SEQ, A.MAIL_TYPE, A.REF_KEY FROM TBL_MAIL_BOX A WHERE 1 = 1 AND SKEY = #{SKEY} AND STATUS = 'EMSTS005'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jmes.TBL_MAIL_BOX ( MAIL_BOX_SEQ, TITLE, CONTEXT, SEND_NAME, SEND_EMAIL, RECV_EMAIL, CC_EMAIL, HCC_EMAIL, GFILE_SEQ, STATUS, DEL_YN, TEMPLATE_SEQ, REF_KEY, INSERT_DT, INSERT_ID ) SELECT #{MAIL_BOX_SEQ}, A.EMAIL_TITLE, A.EMAIL_CONTENT, B.COMP_NM, B.COMP_EMAIL, C.COMP_EMAIL, '' AS CC_EMAIL, '' AS HCC_EMAIL, A.ETC_GFILE_SEQ, 'EMSTS001', 'N', 0, A.EST_SEQ, NOW(), #{USER_ID} FROM jmes.TBL_ESTIMATE A INNER JOIN TBL_COMPANY B ON A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD INNER JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON A.ORDER_COMP_CD = C.COMP_CD WHERE EST_SEQ = #{EST_SEQ}

INSERT INTO jmes.TBL_MAIL_BOX ( MAIL_BOX_SEQ, TITLE, CONTEXT, SEND_NAME, SEND_EMAIL, RECV_EMAIL, CC_EMAIL, HCC_EMAIL, GFILE_SEQ, MAIL_TYPE, STATUS, DEL_YN, TEMPLATE_SEQ, REF_KEY, REF_01, REF_02, REF_03, REF_04, REF_05, INSERT_DT, INSERT_ID ) SELECT NEXTVAL(SEQ_MAIL), REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(A.TEMPLATE_TITLE , '%COMP_NM%', IFNULL(E.COMP_NM, SPACE(0))) , '%MATERIAL_ORDER_NUM%' , IFNULL(B.MATERIAL_ORDER_NUM, SPACE(0))) , '%ORDER_COMP_NM%', IFNULL(C.COMP_NM, SPACE(0))) AS TEMPLATE_TITLE, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(A.TEMPLATE_CONTENT , '%ORDER_COMP_NM%', IFNULL(C.COMP_NM, SPACE(0))) , '%COMP_NM%' , IFNULL(E.COMP_NM, SPACE(0))) , '%INNER_TABLE%', IFNULL(#{INNER_TABLE}, SPACE(0))) AS TEMPLATE_CONTENT, E.COMP_NM AS SEND_NAME, E.COMP_EMAIL AS SEND_EMAIL, C.COMP_EMAIL AS RECV_EMAIL, CC_EMAIL, '' AS HCC_EMAIL, #{GFILE_SEQ}, #{MAIL_TYPE}, 'EMSTS001', 'N' AS DEL_YN, A.TEMPLATE_SEQ, #{REF_KEY}, #{REF_01}, #{REF_02}, #{REF_03}, #{REF_04}, #{REF_05}, NOW() AS INSERT_DT, #{INSERT_ID} FROM TBL_MAIL_TEMPLATE A , TBL_MATERIAL_ORDER B INNER JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON B.MATERIAL_COMP_CD = C.COMP_CD INNER JOIN TBL_CONTROL D ON B.CONTROL_SEQ = D.CONTROL_SEQ INNER JOIN TBL_COMPANY E ON D.COMP_CD = E.COMP_CD WHERE A.TEMPLATE_SEQ = 1 AND B.MATERIAL_ORDER_NUM = #{MATERIAL_ORDER_NUM} AND B.MATERIAL_COMP_CD = #{MATERIAL_COMP_CD} GROUP BY B.MATERIAL_ORDER_NUM

INSERT INTO jmes.TBL_MAIL_BOX ( MAIL_BOX_SEQ, TITLE, CONTEXT, SEND_NAME, SEND_EMAIL, RECV_EMAIL, CC_EMAIL, HCC_EMAIL, GFILE_SEQ, SEND_DT, MAIL_TYPE, STATUS, SKEY, ERROR_NOTE, DEL_YN, TEMPLATE_SEQ, REF_KEY, REF_01, REF_02, REF_03, REF_04, REF_05, INSERT_DT, INSERT_ID ) SELECT NEXTVAL(SEQ_MAIL), REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(TEMPLATE_TITLE, '%CURRENT_TIME%', NOW()), '%COMP_CD%', SF_GET_COMP_NM(#{COMP_CD})), '%ROW_NUM%', #{ROW_CNT}), REPLACE(#{EMAIL_CONTENT_TXT}, 'undefined', SPACE(0)), SF_GET_COMP_NM(#{COMP_CD}), SEND_EMAIL,
#{STAFF_EMAIL},
RECV_EMAIL,
#{STAFF_EMAIL},
CC_EMAIL,
'', #{GFILE_SEQ}, NOW(), #{MAIL_TYPE}, 'EMSTS001', #{SKEY}, #{ERROR_NOTE}, 'N', TEMPLATE_SEQ, #{REF_KEY}, #{REF_01}, #{REF_02}, #{REF_03}, #{REF_04}, #{REF_05}, NOW(), #{LOGIN_USER_ID} FROM TBL_MAIL_TEMPLATE A WHERE TEMPLATE_SEQ = #{TEMPLATE_SEQ}
